values: Because I'm too lazy to colour it today, have a WIP~ Only changed a little bit of his old design =w= Mostly his lower legs and -arms.

Ignore if you want =~=
Just some ranting~

<lj-cut text="rant starts here">
GNNAAAAAHHH!
Why is it so friggin' hard to make everyone satisfied?!?

=___= Gawd....
I like helping my friends and sharing time with them because it makes me happy too, but at the moment I have the feeling that, whenever I do something for one of my friends, another one feels neglected because of it/gets jealous/gets angry/whatever. And this kinda pisses me off.
I really live for making my friends happy. It's one of the things that really, really means something to me. But this is really just.... ARGH!
Yesterday I even had a fight with my best friend =_= (Just a short one, but yeah...)
Just because I'm RPing more with someone else at the moment.
What do they want me to do?! Rip myself in two so I can give everyone, everytime my full attention?!

-Rant ends here-
</lj-cut>

Being restricted to bed is annoying T___T And it's only the 3rd day today.
I'm bored and feeling lonely and have mood swings like a pregnant women. I have nothing to do or at least not the motivation to do anything... Not even drawing and RPing is fun anymore and I'm mean to my friends, which is the worst for me.
*sighs*
Perhaps I should try to write something... Or draw some Teddy-smut to cheer myself up .____.

James Cameron's Avatar is friggin awesome D8 Yeah, it's lacking narrative quality, but I still love it. And I have an Avatar OC RP with ma best friend now |D As always, I had to do the character design.... Well, who would have guessed THAT. Charles and John in their Avatar forms: human!Charles does not like being smaller than John: And an Avatar-ize yourself pic of me xDDDD: And blergh, need something to cheer me up =~=''' *bad mood*

Take evening classes in cosplay.

Learn to play the yaoi.
Overcome my secret fear of mireyuus.

The uncensored version 8'D

Dear Santa...

Dear Santa,

This year I've been busy!

In April I bought porn for (-10 points). Last Monday I farted in an elevator (-6 points). Last Saturday I bought porn for (10 points). Last Sunday on a flight to Bangladesh, I stole the emergency flight information card (-40 points). Last month I saved a busload of nuns in Angola (326 points).

Overall, I've been nice (280 points). For Christmas I deserve a toy train!

Sincerely,
Pandablubb

This is a (very) short (and very rough) comic about Steelflame's past. Might add some pages later but for now that's all. (For better undestanding: there's a time difference of a few weeks between page 2 and 3)

Inspired by an artist on tegaki, I finally drew Steelflame's big brother 8D Let me intodruce you: Crimsonflame! His real name is Racket, but he does not like being called so, because that's the name his father gave him. (Teddy is the only one who's allowed to call him by his real name) He ran away from home to become a musician when he was still a teenager and now Teddy is the only member of his family he is still in contact with. He loves his little brother to death and even named himself after him. ('Crimson' because Steelflame is red and 'flame' because it's the same ending as his brother's name) btw: Crimson is a little bit inspired by two of my former classmates XD They were both the 'independent musician and cool guy'-type :3

Some Steelflame sketches. I am so bored without my best friend to RP with T____T Overload belongs to
tora_shiromaru
Pfff, they really are a pedo pairing considering Over is 22 years older o_O (But I still love it XD''' *likes age difference*)

I was bored and so I drew Steelflame's parents. (Humanized. I don't think I'll ever draw their bot-versions) His father (a former police officer. Now he's a security guard) is 42 and his mother (a former member of a biker gang (she got arrested by Teddy's dad. That's how they met and fell in love XDDD) Now she's just a house wife) is 37. He also has a sibling who's living in another country and is 20 now, but I did not draw him |D''' Daddy was inspired by a character of the Silent Hill RP of my best friend and me. Mommy is based on Ichiko and Momoko from Kamikaze Girls XD (Only her character, not her appearance) Hm.... I do see a little problem here: Teddy's dad is 42. Only a few years older than Overload... Daddy wont like Over XD'''' And his mum is younger than Overload. She will definitely like Over. Very much. A bit too much perhaps XD

Purr and Teddy are making snowmen. The rest is self-explanatory, I hope XD (But d'awww, I wanna make a Rock-snowman now xD) Done on one A4 page without references for Purr XD' And it's just a doodle, that's why it's kind crappy xDDDD

Have some sketches today~ Steelflame x2 Meddus bugs x5 Silent Hill RP x2 Transformers humanized RP x2 Steelflame with Overload, who belongs to Tora And a hentai expression meme I've never finished u_u And probably never will. Don't have the motivation for it. My Scarabin Albar X3 With Maran's character Florence. I love them as a pair X3 Karnas the Leafhopper with his pet pillar and Xien the silkworm, stuck in his own silk Characters from the Silent Hill RP of my best friend and me. Sexy nun monsters ftw XDDD Wheelie and Mikaela & Maggie Madsen after watching too much Golden Boy XD

I was at the Nicon yesterday and as said, I had to sit at our booth to promote our own convention here in Hamburg, the ChisaiiCon.
We sat there for 12 hours. Straight. Me and Kekz walked around for about 1/2h to make a little break, but that's all we did XD
It was very tyring, but also fun and I think we did enough advertising so that the travel to Hannover was not for nothing.

Just finished playing 'Professor Layton and the Diabolical Box' X3 Well... not really finished. I've around 120 riddles of 140+ solved. Have to search the last ones now.
But the ending was so sweet and tragic ;w; I had tears in my eyes.
When I've got enough time, I want to draw a fanart of it X333

And now I've started playing the german version of Kingdom Hearts 358/2 days.
It sucks, because I've played the japanese version until day 76 already and now I have to do all the missions again XD' Daaaamn.
But yay for understanding the plot XD

ARGH, my hip hurts so bad T___T'

I hope it'll be better till saturday u_u

The Nicon (a convention in Hannover) is this weekend and I and three of my friends will be there. We'll be having a booth there for our own convention here in Hamburg, the ChisaiiCon 2010. It's a very small convention (only 600+ visitors this year, which is really small compared to our normal bimonthly fan-meeting which already has 500+ visitors too. But who cares D8) but I and Kekzi are part of the organisation-team since a month and I feel kind of important because of that xD
I'm in charge for workshops and programm X3 Hope I'll do my work good, so our visitors will have fun!

And well, this saturday we have to make a bit of PR xD
Wish us luck so that we make a good impression :3
We need more visitors!

My friend Riedel (cutest girl ever X3 She's so tiny X3333 Only 1.43m ...I'm 1.78m tall) visited me this weekend and we started a new RP together for which we drew our new characters. I love all of them so I thought I should post them here 8D First: Captain Diana, First Princess of the Kingdom of Atlas. She joined the army to defend her people and fight for her land. Alice, Second Princess of Atlas and Dianas little sister. (I don't like her yet XD She's an annoying little girl, but we needed a character like her for the story) She has a crush on Lord Adam and dislikes her sister for betraying her and joining the army. Defayon (Fay). He's an elf one of the 37 royal children of the Kingdom of Terra (the enemy country of Atlas) and he was supposed to be the next king but did not want to. That's why he traveled to Atlas, long before the war between the two countries started and became a citizen of Atlas. Now he's the bodyguard and caretaker of Princess Alice. Palith is an elf, just like Fay, but he's not of royal blood. He lived near the border to Atlas, but after his sister was murdered and he himself badly injured, he flew into the woods of Yggdrasil for shelter. He remained silent since then in honour of his sister because she was mute. Whenever he is forced to say a word, he punishes himself afterwards. Finn, a white phoenix, is his only companion and he believes that the soul of his sister was reincarnated into this bird. Lord Adam's true name is Prince Adamant. He's one of Fay's half-brothers but the two of them never met. He's a demon but disguised himself as a human by cutting off his ears, tail and wings. Adam went to Atlas years before Fay because he was looking for the secret power which was hidden by both countries millenia ago. He found out it was converted into Yggdrasil, the world tree. Leaf is the soul and power of Yggdrasil. Adam kidnaps her and tries to get her power. My favourite character: Kimbaile (Kim). She's a Tigra (some kind of anthropomorphic tiger. Half tiger, half human) and part of the best mercenary/bountyhunter duo in Terra. She's very tiny and looks quite young, but she's 60 years old (equivalent to 17 human years) and very strong and agile. She's hot-tempered and loves to fight. Obviously. Not even Adam is as bloodthirsty as her. She has the habbit to call herself a man, which makes her and Eremis' relationship gay in her eyes. It's quite confusing for everyone else, even for Eremis, but she likes it this way... Last but not least: Kim's partner in crime, Eremis. Called Rem (but only by her. Everyone else will be killed for it). He's a Berserker and friggin tall and muscular. In contrary to his partner, he's quiet and calm and sometimes a bit grumpy. He cares for Kim and keeps her under control. - Alice, Fay and Leaf are drawn by Riedel. We also have two soldiers of Atlas, Steve and Sam, but the character sheets for them are not done yet. Steve is an arrogant womanizer and asshole and Sam, his best friend, eats all the time X3 I love these two. Have to draw them, when I get time

Tora said he needs a profile, so I wrote one XD
Had nothing better to do...

and -wooohoooo- I decided to make him a mech XD


Name: Steelflame
Nickname: Grizzly
Sex: mech
Age: 17 in human years
Height: about 2.50m
Weight: 300kg
Faction: Decepticons
Function: warrior, scout
Weapon: double-bladed sword
Alt. Mode: Yamaha Grizzly ATV
Personality: His whole family was part of the Decepticon army and he tries to follow this tradition even though he would prefer being neutral. He has a strong sense for duty and justice (which doesn’t go well with him being a decepticon), is quite hot-tempered and reckless and gets himself in danger quite often because of that. He cares for his comrades and never leaves someone behind.
Abilities/skills: He is specialized in close-combat and sword fighting. Since his weapon is extremely big and he is not the strongest mech, he has to use his whole body to use it. For that he has the grills on his feet so he can kick the lower blade in the direction of his opponent without injuring himself. He’s also fond of using kicks when his opponent is too close for hitting him fast enough with his sword.



Strength: 4
Intelligence: 7
Endurance: 8
Speed: 6
Courage: 8
Willpower: 10
Firepower: 6
Skill: 9

Likes: relaxing after battles, reading, fighting, rain
Dislikes: Highgrade Energon (he gets drunk real fast), loosing
Fears: being unable to fulfill his duties

Today while watching a Bollywood-movie (Boothnath. It's friggin cute X3) I had nothing better to do than to try drawing a new OC. ...too bad I'll never use him/her, because I have no OC-based RPs T___T (And it's depressing to draw my OCs without any companions) Don't know whether it's a femme or a mech... He/She was inspired by Alice L. Malvin from Pumpkin Scissors (that's why the OC uses the same weapon as her *luv* A double-bladed sword which is far bigger than him/her sword reference) though, so it was supposed to be a femme at first. But now it looks more like a mech. Btw: he/she transforms into a Yamaha Grizzly ATV. Because I love Quads X3 I think (s)he looks cute with bear ears. ...(s)he doesn't
I've worked over my OCs design a bit and I'm much more satisfied now. btw, would anyone be interested in an OC competition? link to my DA journal
